p: Between June 2015 and July 2016, 624 persons were screened for participation in HPTN 075. Twenty-three persons were excluded because they did not meet inclusion criteria for the current analysis. Exclusion was largely due to never having had sex with men (9); discordant test results (6); and being too young (4). Four persons were unwilling to undergo HIV testing throughout the study and to receive these test results; these individuals had no HIV test result at screening. Among the remaining 601 MSM&TW persons who were eligible for this study, the median age was 23 years (interquartile range [IQR]: 20â€“28 years). One hundred thirty-six participants who identified as female or transgender were classified as TW (22.6%; 136/601, Table 1). Over half of the participants (57.6%; 346/601) reported ever having had sex with women ( Table 1).
